subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The governing body of English soccer has “serious reservations” about plans to play a round of Premier League games overseas, particularly fearing that it would harm England’s bid to be the host to the 2018 World Cup.
snippet: The governing body of English soccer has “serious reservations” about plans to play a round of Premier League games overseas, particularly fearing that it would harm England’s bid to be the host to the 2018 World Cup.
